document_title: Cirrhosis ascites: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_content: Ascites cirrhosis is a dangerous liver disease and has a high mortality rate, up to 90% if in the late stages. Not only that, cirrhosis with ascites is also a precursor to liver cancer, a type of cancer with a 21% cancer mortality rate.
subsection_title: xo gan co truong.json. Is cirrhosis and ascites dangerous?
subsection_data:
xo gan co truong.json. Is cirrhosis and ascites dangerous?
Ascites cirrhosis is a dangerous liver disease and has a high mortality rate, up to 90% if in the late stages. Not only that, cirrhosis with ascites is also a precursor to liver cancer, a type of cancer with a 21% cancer mortality rate.
